name: Rajnish Kundu
body:
**Name :** Rajnish Kundu **Address :** Village + P.O. : Rajballavpur, P.S. : Habra, District : North 24 Parganas **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2014 **Mentor :** Ritabrata Dasgupta (Jadavpur University, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhyamik : 85.7% ; Higher Secondary : 84.6% **Present Course :** Physics (UG III) Barasat Govt. College

Rajnish can often be found selling fruits, when he is not studying, on the platform of Maslandapur railway station in North 24 Parganas. His father owns this small fruit shop and supports the family with the meagre earnings. After securing 85.7% in his Madhyamik, Rajnish received free coaching from an organisation based in Habra when he was in the 11th and 12th grade. His perseverance paid off when he scored 84.6% in the H.S Examinations and got admitted to Barasat Govt. College for a bachelor’s in Physics in 2015. Srijan Sujan has extended its full support to Rajnish since 2015.
